name: Kungfu Stickman 3: Stick Ninja
description:
Kung Fu Stickman 3 Kingdom - The newest action game, the game is expected to become new wave. Begin write a kung fu Legends.
Do you want a game with game play simple but attractive? With amazing graphics and attractive game play , this game will bring to you the feeling which become a hero in the epic battles. In first period of game, you're a stickman soldier . At that time, you have only a dagger in your hand - A street stickman fighter. You must collect gold through every battles to equip new stronger weapons, new items. Become stronger, and you gain more gold, more achievement.
Your task is protect your king, defend your country, keep him alive as long as possible! This game has gameplay same like tower defend games but simpler. You only need tap to perform all kung fu combo spectacular. Faster you tap, more combo you perform , more gold you earn !
******** FEATURE *********
- Endless Mode : Survival as long as you possible
- Weapons System: Hundreds of legend weapons ( Crescent Blade, Dragon Spear, Double Spear, Axe, Club, Stick, Ton fa, Nunchucks, Dagger, Sword, Bow, Staff, Halberd, etc...).
- Upgrade weapons system : You have to upgrade your weapon step by step to make it stronger and become a weapon master. ( 5 level / weapon).
- Costume System : Hundreds of heads, faces, bodies. Wear it to become your favourite generals.
- Full set bonus : When you equip a Three Kingdom General's full set, you gain more weapon damage.
- Unlock Kings : Collect gold to unlock great Kings. Each king has his own unique ability. When the king angry , he can perform Fury Skill and destroy enemies with only one hit !
- Unlock Enemies : Unlock enemies to beat another bosses and gain more gold.
- Unlock Battles : Unlock famous battle of Three Kingdom.
- Quest, Achievement System : Complete quest to gain achievement and gold.

*********COMING SOON********
- Multiplayer mode.
- Raid boss mode. ( Bosses : Lu Bu, Dong Zhou , Meng Hou, Guan Yu, Zhao Yun, Shima Yi , Zhang Liao, Cao Pi, Gan Ning, Lu Meng, Zhou Yu).

*********NOTE*********
- This game is so amazing so you shouldn't play game 2 or 3 hours / day to keep your health.

- In game , have a blood scenes and violence. You may want to keep away it from your kids , younger boys and girls. Even anger men shouldn't also play it .
************************************************************************
Now don't wait , Let download KungFu Stickman Three Kingdom! Join fighting and fight like fighters ! Faster your shadow! Become a True Warriors.
